context: Post and Core,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Composite tooth filling,Dental Fillings,
review:
This is the first time I'm writing a review for any doctor. I visited HSR dental clinic and implant center with multiple issues ranging from gross misconstructes tooth, multiple fillings, an RCT that I did elsewhere that eventually broke, 2 impending tooth extraction that I postponed for more than 3 years at the inner top jaw. I must say that though I went for a second opinion after having consulted another doctor, I'm glad I visited this centre. Now on to the results first...

I did not undergo a single extraction and still no pain so far. Dr. Deepak analysed me first and suggested clearly that I needed composite filling followed by two RCTs and then fibre.optic post and then a crown. Each stage was then explained again by Dr.Pujitha. I was given clear indication of seatings it would take, time it would take, cost based in various options right from post to crown and lifetime for each options. 

Dr. Deepak was extremely friendly.and at the same time has an uncanny ability to ease you from pressure and super efficient. He is so methidocal in terms of what he wants you to do and what sort of treatment he is going to provide. He also makes us aware of the precaution well before. I was really surprised that without anesthesia there was multiple core and post fiber optic treatment being given and on second post since I complained about a bit of pain, he administered anesthesia. I must say that through all these* * ***** *** ****** ** ** *** ** *** **** **** ***** *** *** ** ******** ***** *** ********** ************ *** *********** I told him that I couldn't thank him enough for patience he showed though I was non cooperative at times due to involuntary reactions at times ...  All I got in return was a smile and wishing me all well. 

Dr. Pujitha was super calm irrespective.of how much ever questions i had and was so much focussed in providing ***** treatment. Not once did I see.aby kind of frustration from her despite having to carry out difficult composite fillings at times... 

Overall, though I can't say I would like to visit them again ( I don't want another tooth related issue :) , if you guys are reading this, you know how painful in general tooth problems are ), I am super confident that you will get one of the best treatment you can aspire for ..in Bangalore.

review:
During my recent visit to the clinic regarding concerns about my wisdom tooth, I had the opportunity to meet with both Doctor Roy and Doctor Deepak. They thoroughly examined my condition and provided valuable insights on the measures that could be taken. Overall, the experience was satisfactory, with one exception.

The aspect that I found disappointing was the discussion about the cost of the extraction procedure. Initially, Doctor Roy informed me that if I opted for a specialized dentist, the charge would be 6000/-. However, if I chose to have the extraction performed by the in-house doctors, the cost would be 3500/-. This seemed like a reasonable difference in price.
